Articles.Content: I would like to, if possible, test the pre release version of KSP 2. I also have in many cases helped out with flaws in iOS and beta tested much of their new iOS softwares.

50 minutes ago, AB44400 said:

I would like to, if possible, test the pre release version of KSP 2. I also have in many cases helped out with flaws in iOS and beta tested much of their new iOS softwares.

There isn’t a pre release version and the game won’t come out till next year’s fall
